Any fields prefixed `dc.` will be rendered as DCMI `` tags. !!! OpenGraph To add [ext[Open Graph|https://ogp.me/]] tags to your wiki, tag a tiddler with <$macrocall $name=tag-pill tag={{$:/plugins/benwebber/semantic/config/Tags/OpenGraph}} />. Fields prefixed with `og.` will be rendered as OpenGraph `` tags. Note that the plugin will automatically replace `.` characters in the field name with `:`.
